summary: A photo-realistic ENB specifically developed for the Climates of Tamriel
descriptionHtml:
[size=10]ClearENB ver 2.4. [/size] by BADAwave

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-1-1364284913.jpg[/img]

[size=6] Introduction [/size]

An ENB preset specifically modified to be used with the Climates of Tamriel. It offers photo-realistic color and crispness that dynamically changes according to numerous weather conditions added by the CoT. You will be able to enjoy the truly immersive world of Tamriel.

[size=6] Update [/size]

-	Finally, it is optimized for the latest ENB v0.155 version. Now you can easily modify the setting further by pressing Shift+Enter in game!!
-	Lots of bug fixes such as flickering shadow, over bright interior lights, and etc.
-	General improvement of lighting and overall color tone. 

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-2-1364285432.jpg[/img]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-3-1364285432.jpg[/img]

[size=6]Comparison[/size]

[size=4]Vanilla[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-2-1364287679.jpg[/img]

[size=4]Vanilla + CoT[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-1-1364287880.jpg[/img]

[size=4]ClearENB v2.4 + CoT[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-3-1364287679.jpg[/img]

[size=6]Installation:[/size]

[size=4][color=red]-You must install jjc7\'s Project Reality - Climates of Tamriel if you wish to use this enb. It can be downloaded from here: [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802[/url][/size]

- Under \"basefiles\" folder, select a folder based on your computer performance, and copy and paste all the files underneath to the main Skyrim installation folder.

- go here ([url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0155.htm]http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0155.htm[/url]). Download the zip and open. Then, copy/paste d3d9.dll file to the main Skyrim installation folder.

- [size=4]OPTION 1:[/size] if you want SMAA or removal of certain effects, copy file(s) under the subfolder of the \"options\" folder and paste them into the main Skyrim installation folder.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/30238-1-1364284766.jpg[/img]
